Seirbhísí Sláinte do Dhaoine Míchumasaithe
Health services for people with disabilities
Seirbhísí sláinte do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas
A general introduction to the services provided by the Health Service Executive (HSE) for people with disabilities
Cuireann Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte seirbhísí sláinte ar fáil do dhaoine le míchumas
Assessment of need for people with disabilities
Measúnú ar riachtanais do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas
The Disability Act 2005 provides for, among other things, the assessment of need of people with disabilities
Forálann an tAcht um Míchumas 2005, i measc nithe eile, go ndéanfar measúnú ar riachtanais do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas
Find out how the assessment is carried out
Faigh amach conas a dhéantar an measúnú
Day centres and day care
Ionaid lae agus cúram lae
Day centres and day care centres in Ireland provide a range of social and rehabilitative services for older people and people with disabilities
Cuireann an chápéis seo síos ar ionaid Lae agus ar ionaid chúraim lae a chuireann réimse seirbhísí sóisialta agus athshlánaithe ar fáil do dhaoine níos sine agus do dhaoine atá faoi mhíchumas
Respite care provides alternative family or institutional care to someone who needs care, so that their carer can take a short break, a holiday or a rest

Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar Chúram Faoisimh, is féidir cúram le teaghlach eile nó in institiúid a bheith i gceist do dhuine faoi mhíchumas le deis a thabhairt don chúramóir sos beag, saoire nó scíth a thógáil
Regulation of residential services for people with disabilities
Rialú ar sheirbhísí cónaitheacha do dhaoine le míchumais
Residential services for people with disabilities are required to meet certain standards
Ní foláir go sásaíonn na seirbhísí cónaitheacha do dhaoine le míchumais caighdeáin áirithe
The Health Information and Quality Authority (HIQA) is responsible for their registration and inspection
Is é an tÚdarás um Fhaisnéis agus Cáilíocht Sláinte (HIQA) a bhíonn freagrach as a gclárúchán agus a gcigireacht
Long-Stay Contributions for Residential Support Services
Ranníocaíochtaí fadchónaithe i leith seirbhísí tacaíochta cónaitheacha

If your accommodation or your daily living costs are provided by the Health Service Executive (HSE), or on behalf of the HSE, you may have to pay a Long-Stay Contribution towards these maintenance and accommodation costs

Más í Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) a sholáthraíonn do chóiríocht nó do chostais bheatha laethúla, nó go soláthraítear iad thar ceann na FSS, b’fhéidir go gcaithfeá Ranníocaíocht Fhadchónaithe a íoc leis na costais chothabhála agus cóiríochta úd
Rehabilitation and training services for people with disabilities
Seirbhísí athshlánaithe agus traenála do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas
There are various rehabilitation, training and employment services for people with disabilities. Find out more
Cuireann an cháipéis seo síos ar sheirbhísí athshlánaithe, traenála agus fostaíochta do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas
National Physical and Sensory Disability Database
An Bunachar Sonraí Náisiúnta um Míchumas Fisiceach agus Céadfach
Ireland's national Physical and Sensory Disability Database contains information on the specialised health and personal social service needs of people in Ireland with a physical or sensory disability

Cuireann an cháipéis seo síos ar an mBanc Sonraí um Mhíchumas Fisiceach agus Céadfach atá eolas aige ar na sainriachtanais sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta daoine atá faoi mhíchumas fisiceach nó céadfach
National Intellectual Disability Database
An Bunachar Sonraí Náisiúnta um Míchumas Intleachta
The National Intellectual Disability Database is used to monitor and plan services for people with intellectual disabilities
Cuireann an cháipéis seo síos ar an mBanc Sonraí um Mhíchumas Intleachtúil, conas a gcuirtear le chéile é, cén t-eolas atá coinnithe air agus cén chaoi gur féidir teacht ar an eolas sin
A means tested supplementary payment made to certain people who are blind or visually impaired
Íocaíocht bhreise de réir tástála acmhainne atá i gceist a íoctar do dhaoine áirithe atá dall nó a bhfuil míchumas súl orthu
